short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download Photos and Videos from Instagram Post, Reels, TV, Stories

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome extension "Instagram Content Downloader" has the following purposes:
Meeting Diverse Content Acquisition Needs
It is mainly designed to facilitate users to download various types of content from the Instagram platform. Whether it's the daily-viewed picture and text posts, the appealing short videos (reels), or the fleeting stories, such as the latest stories and the carefully curated highlight stories, all can be easily downloaded and saved to local devices by using this extension. In this way, users can view these contents at any time even when they are offline, or share them according to their own needs and use them as materials for other purposes.

Usage

* Go to any `post`, `reels`, `stories`, etc. Then click `Download` button to fetch data.
* Click on any photos/videos to save.
* Toggle multi select by click on `Photos` and select photos by click on them (or select all by click and hold on `Photos`). Then click on `Download` to save zip file.
* If you scroll on the home page, this app will auto detect the post you wanna download so you don't have to click to comment section to open modal. Thanks to ReactFiber.

Features
* Download posts ✔
* Download reels ✔
* Download latest stories ✔
* Download highlight stories ✔
* Support high resolution ✔
* Support download zip file ✔
